callcryptor.sync.title: CallCryptor Synchronization
callcryptor.sync.privacy_warning_text:
Synchronization is COMPLETELY OPTIONAL and DISABLED by default.
Audio files ARE NOT synchronized - only metadata (contacts, dates, tags, transcriptions).
Data is stored on your account and password-protected.
You can disable synchronization at any time.
callcryptor.sync.auto_sync_tooltip: Automatically synchronize changes in the background
callcryptor.sync.dont_show_again: Don't show this window again (can be changed in settings)
callcryptor.sync.disable_sync_tooltip: Stops automatic synchronization (data will remain on the server)

proapp.bat_question:
Should the .bat file open a console?

YES - Console will be visible
NO - Program will run without a console
proapp.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear editor and logs?
proapp.help_content:
Pro-App - Python Compiler

Module for testing, running and managing Python scripts.

Functionality:

  • Testing Python code syntax
  • Running code in the console
  • Automatic detection and installation of missing libraries
  • Creation of .bat and .py files
  • Integration with Artificial Intelligence (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini)

How to use:

  1. Ask AI: "Create a script for [your task]"
  2. Copy the generated code
  3. Paste it into the editor and click "Test Syntax"
  4. If libraries are missing, click "Install"
  5. Run the code with the "Run" button
  6. Save as .py or .bat
